channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PULS for Nova TV, 1–20 April 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 4–5 seats
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 2–3 seats
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 1 seats
  • Živi zid (*): 2 seats
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Hrvatska seljačka stranka (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 0 seats
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Pametno (ALDE): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PULS for Nova TV, 1–20 April 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 27.3–33.2%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 17.2–22.4%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 6.2–9.7%
  • Živi zid (*): 12.8–17.5%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 0.6–2.0%
  • Hrvatska seljačka stranka (EPP): 3.7–6.6%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 2.3–4.7%
  • Istarski demokratski sabor (ALDE): 2.0–4.2%
  • Pametno (ALDE): 2.2–4.6%
